product_overview: CountWize is a crypto recovery and education website offering embedded Vimeo videos, curated news feeds, educational content, and a consistent user experience across all pages. The revamp focuses on improving video integration, content integrity, brand consistency, and UI polish to ensure a seamless, trustworthy platform for users.
core_goals: Replace broken video embeds with direct Vimeo player for reliable playback.
Ensure all educational video content and hero videos function correctly without misleading links.
Replace placeholder and duplicated news articles with curated, static crypto news content.
Fix all broken or missing images, icons, and remove misplaced image content in text for content integrity.
Enforce strict brand consistency by correcting all variations of "CountWize" across the site.
Refine layout and styling for better readability, visual hierarchy, and responsive design across multiple sections.
Verify and fix platform links to ensure valid external references.
Design improvements for book covers to visually distinct and align with their topics.
key_features: Direct Vimeo video embeds replacement for About and Education pages, plus hero video lightbox on homepage.
Fully functional hero "Watch video" button linking to actual Vimeo videos or removed when unavailable.
Interactive lessons video cards enabling video playback on click across Home and Education pages.
Curated static Social News Feed sourcing crypto news from reputed outlets with source logos, dates, and titles.
Handpicked educational news section linking to crypto recovery/security content with images.
Trending News section featuring unique, large news cards and list items without duplication.
Multiple UI and UX improvements including brand name consistency, corrected punctuation, distinctive icons for mission and recovery reasons.
Enhanced footer, core values layout, blog grid centering, and hero call-to-action vertical stacking.
Updated platform links with valid URLs or removal where inappropriate.
Redesigned book covers with thematic imagery representing legal, wallet recovery, forensics, scams, and case studies.
user_flow_summary: User visits homepage and watches hero video in a lightbox powered by direct Vimeo embed.
User clicks lesson cards on Home or Education pages to immediately play educational videos.
User explores curated social and trending news feeds with clear source attribution and clickable links opening in new tabs.
User navigates About page to view reliable embedded videos, mission and vision with distinct icons, and team members.
User reads educational content on crypto recovery guiding visuals without broken images or misplaced content.
User interacts with clear CTA buttons that are harmonized with video availability and content context.
User experiences consistent branding of 'CountWize' site-wide with improved readability and UI layouts.
User accesses platform links trusting they lead to genuine CountWize resources or are gracefully omitted.
User browses blog content with centered grid layout and correct branding throughout.
validation_criteria: All Vimeo embedded videos load and play without errors on About, Education, and Home pages.
Hero Watch video button either plays actual video or is removed; lesson video cards function on click.
No "content blocked" or "Cannot load link" messages anywhere on the site.
No duplicate or placeholder news articles; all external news links open correctly in new tabs.
All broken/missing images and icons replaced with correct assets; no stray images or alt text embedded within text paragraphs.
All instances of "Count Wise" or "Count Wize" replaced with "CountWize" across the codebase.
No usage of em-dashes or spaced hyphens as punctuation; all replaced with periods or commas as appropriate.
Core values section heading stacked vertically above description; footer contact grouped logically; hero content CTAs stacked vertically.
Blog grid centers odd-numbered last article with correct CSS.
All platform logos link to valid CountWize URLs or are removed if invalid.
All book covers show updated, distinct designs matching each book's theme.
